entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for target. Stand by to proceed with the attack.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Nav location to the target has been located. Proceed with extreme prejudice.
entries.assassinate_success: Ha! Good work, pilot. You'll teach Sordaan to mess with Ziven's people.
entries.autorewardbody: That takes care of the second freighter. This should get Sordaan's attention. Well done. Reward enclosed.
entries.destroy_escort: The entire squad must be eradicated.
entries.failed_escape: You let them escape! Return to Banol for further instructions. Hopefully, we'll try again.
entries.quest_escort_d: Destroy any remaining fighters that were escorting Sordaan's freighter.
entries.quest_location_d: Another of Sordaan's freighters is preparing to leave the system. Prepare to attack it.
entries.quest_target_d: Time for another of Sordaan's freighters to add to the space dust! Destroy his freighter before it can leave the system.
entries.title: Kashyyyk System: Take out Sordaan's freighter.
entries.title_d: Destroy another of Sordaan's freighter and its escort. Be ready for a tougher fight this time. Sordaan is bounded to have increased his freighter's protection.
